title: Shout Mountain Music
lyrics:
I'm gonna sing and jump and shout
Gonna blow the windows out
I'm gon' play my fiddle loud all night long
And I ain't gonna change my sound
When ole' Smokey comes around
Gonna shout mountain music all night long



All night long (all night long)

All night long (all night long)

I'll be high up on the mountain when daylight comes

And I ain't gonna change my sound

When ole' Smokey comes around

I'm gon' shout mountain music all night long



I'm gonna fire up my [? 0:51]

I'm gon' boog-a-loo my blues

Gonna cut a rug from Raleigh to Richmond

And my banjo strings'll break (? 0:57)

Oh and open that pearly gate

Gonna up and jive and buck and wing

Rattle them bones and shout and sing

Shoutin' mountain music all night long



All night long (all night long)

All night long (all night long)

I'll be high up on the mountain when daylight comes

And I ain't gonna change my sound

When ole' Smokey comes around

I'm gon' shout mountain music all night long



When I first rolled into town

They said, "Turn that rig around

"Boy, that fiddle and the banjo don't belong"

But I resined up my bow

I said, "Boys, let it go"

So take a match and burn it down

Grab you partner, swing 'em round



All night long (all night long)

All night long (all night long)

I'll be high up on the mountain when daylight comes

And I ain't gonna change my sound

When I get to Nashville-town

Shoutin' mountain music all night long



All night long (all night long)

All night long (all night long)

I'll be high up on the mountain when daylight comes

And I ain't gonna change my sound

When I get to Nashville-town

I'm gon' shout my mountain music all night long
